game.name: 3DDefender
game.desc: You have to save your home planet from marauding Alien spacecraft.

game.name: 3DMonsterMaze

game.name: Gunfight
game.desc: Old fashioned western style gunfight either against the computer or another player (on same keyboard). Surprisingly fun fast moving gunfight game. can set the game difficulty and speed. Dodge the opponents bullet whilst shooting yours past the wagon to hit them.

game.name: Booster
game.desc: Booster is a follow up to Rocket Man. Like that game it is a platformer where the player uses a jetpack to fly between platforms. The objective of the game is to collect fuel cells that appear at random positions on the right side of the screen. These then have to be transported back to the player's flying saucer which is located on the left side. In the way there are plenty of hazards and bad guys that the player has to avoid. These include spiders, skulls, pests and nettles. The player also can't take too long as he has a limited supply of air. Another way of dying is crashing into a platform with the jetpack. The game has five levels that can be played in any order.

game.name: FlightSimulation
game.desc: Popular Computing Weekly said of Psion's Flight Simulation on the ZX81 "No words can do justice to this most elegant of programs ... You will not see a better computer game till Psion produce one for the Spectrum". Here it is. Learn to fly, bank, dive and climb, see the world outside through the cockpit windows, land and take-off with the aid of the many cockpit instruments.

game.name: Galaxy Invaders
game.desc: Galaxy Invaders is a Space Invaders clone where you control a craft on the bottom of the screen moving left or right, blasting aliens above in formation. The aliens move across the screen slowly descending downwards. As you blast the aliens, you must avoid the bombs that they drop because if you hit one or allow an alien to land on the bottom of the screen you lose one of three lives. Between your craft and the aliens are five shields but parts disappear when hit by your bullets or the alien's bombs. Before the game you can choose the speed of the game (0-9) from easy to very hard.

game.name: Glooper
game.desc: A Pac-Man clone where you have to move about a maze to eat all the dots while avoiding three creatures moving about the maze. If you touch a creature then you lose one of three lives but there are power-pills that can be collected.

game.name: Graffity
game.desc: Action game in the vein of Zolyx or Quicksilva's Damper. Surround all squares with paint before the cleaners wipe it off.

game.name: Galaxians
game.desc: Galaxians is as can be expected a variant of the arcade game Galaxian. It's a fixed screen shooter where the player move his spacecraft down the bottom of the screen and has to shoot at the aliens moving back and forth above him. Aliens will at time leave their formation and swoop down towards the player try to collide with him or hit him with bombs. Aliens in formation are worth ten points while attacking aliens are worth twenty. When all three lives have been lost the game ends and the player gets to enter his name for a high score.

game.name: Gauntlet, The
game.desc: The Gauntlet is a clone of the arcade game Scramble which is viewed from the side with the screen scrolling horizontally constantly from left to right for one to two players. You control a spacecraft and you must fly over a mountainous planet's surface bombing various installations while avoiding missiles that fly upwards. As well as your bombs you are also armed with a laser that fires forward. As you fly, a fuel gauge decreases and you need to bomb fuel dumps to keep your fuel levels up. If you are hit by a missile, crash into the surface or run out of fuel then you lose one of three lives and it's the 2nd players turn if two player is selected.

game.name: Mazogs
game.desc: Run through the maze to get the treasure before the Mazogs eat you.

game.name: Zuckman
game.desc: Zuckman is based on the arcade game Pac-Man and has you moving about a maze attempting to clear it by eating all the dots. As you move around the maze there are four ghosts moving around as well and if you touch one then you lose one of three lives. There are power-pills though and when eaten, allow you to eat the ghosts for a short time.

game.name: Forty Niner
game.desc: It's 1849 and the American gold rush has just started. The player in this game is one of the many that set off to the west coast in search for the precious metal. He must dig his way through the earth and excavate the gold but at the same time avoid the creatures that move around under ground.
